entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
